content:
Slightly OT but figured I shared it since it might interest some people here :)

https://forums.swift.org/t/swift-type-checking-is-undecidable/39024/2

Undecidable constraint solving in Swift by encoding semigroup word problems into swift protocols
I used to be part of the Swift community before discovering how cool Rust is :)
Slava is one of the people I remember the most from there, they keep posting cool stuff like this
